component.notes:
PARA TVS QUE O POWER ON NÃO FUNCIONA!!! GERALMENTE TVS ANTIGAS.
SETUP NOTES FOR IP CONTROL: -In order to enable IP control, the following settings needs to be enabled. - Home > Network > Home Network > IP Control > Simple IP Control > On - Home > Network > Remote Start > On
RS232 CONTROL: -RS232 connection requires 3.5mm serial cable (null modem). -Pinout for Stereo plug is: Tip : Pin 2 : Receive (Rx) Ring : Pin 3 : Transmit (Tx) Sleeve: Pin 5 : Ground (GND) ====================== Change Log ================== Version: 1.5 Change: Fixed IP Select command. Risk: Low Importance: Critical Version: 1.4 Change: Update profile note. Risk: Low Importance: Helpful Version: 1.3 Change: Fixed IP power commands. Risk: Low Importance: Critical Version: 1.2 Change: Added missing OSD commands to the external media resource. Risk: Low Importance: Non Critical
Version: 2.5, Change: removido opções avançadas de serviços de internet
Version: 3.5, Change: Renomeado
Version: 4.5, Change: Adicionado input para profile Smart TV
Version: 5.5, Change: Edicao resouces input smart tv
Version: 6.5, Change: yesye
Version: 7.0, Change: Adicionado Home antes do power Off
Version: 7.1, Change: aumento do delay do home
Version: 7.2, Change: aumento do delay do home
Version: 7.3, Change: Remoção do botão Home e duplo comando de power off
Version: 7.4, Change: adição de home entre os duplos comandos off
Version: 8.0, Change: Comando de HOME antes de troca de HDMI
Version: 8.1, Change: Duplo comando de HOME antes de troca de HDMI
Version: 8.2, Change: Duplo comando de EXIT + Home antes de troca de HDMI
Version: 8.5, Change: Adição de um novo comando de Power On 2 ultimos
